scripts.build-vdaas: npm run build-designer && npm run build-report && pnpm -F integration-vdaas-web build && npm run postBuild-vdaas
scripts.build: npm run build-designer && npm run build-report && npm run build-jasperreport && npm run build-docs && npm run postBuild
scripts.build-vdata: npm run build && npm run postBuild-vdata
